experience.description: Participated in NJACK Winter of Code organised by Indian Institute of Technology, Patna on the lines of Google Summer of Code. Contributed to projects like nwoc-algorithms, learn-for-free.

projects.name: Codeforces Profile Viewer
projects.description: A Profile Viewer in Python which displays basic information of user, rating changes of user in a particular contest, excel file for userâ€™s contest history. For fetching data Codeforces API is used in JSON.

projects.name: Linux Mini Terminal
projects.description: A Linux terminal implemented in C programming language using concepts of fork, exec, signals, pipes etc. Different kinds of interrupts were also handled.

projects.name: Music Player
projects.description: A django based music player app, which provides functionality of upload, store and play music by storing on cloud.

projects.name: DotSlash Community Website
projects.description: Designed the dotslash community website, where the first year student had the option to practice the questions, discuss any doubts and details about the contest conduct by community.

projects.name: Online Shopping Management System
projects.description: An Online Shopping Management system implemented using concepts of OOPs and file handling for storing data in C++.

projects.name: Data Management System
projects.description: A student record data management system implemented using AVL trees and Linked Lists and file handling for storing data in C.
